## LiquityReceipt type

One of either a [PendingReceipt](./lib-base-u.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, a [FailedReceipt](./lib-base-u.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./lib-base-u.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type LiquityReceipt<R = unknown, D = unknown> = PendingReceipt | MinedReceipt<R, D>;
```
<b>References:</b> [PendingReceipt](./lib-base-u.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, [MinedReceipt](./lib-base-u.minedreceipt.md)
